alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette; Fulton; Meriwether (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 5:08PM EDT until August 28 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Fayette County in north central Georgia... North central Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Coweta County in west central Georgia... Southwestern Fulton County in north central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 508 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Turin, or 10 miles southeast of Newnan, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newnan, City of South Fulton, Peachtree City, Tyrone, Palmetto, Senoia, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, Haralson, Chattahoochee Hills, East Newnan, Arnco-Sargent, Dunaway Gardens, Cannongate, Roscoe, Thomas Crossroads, and Madras. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
